Summary: I saw an object that appeared to be a small balloon, but it changed direction and moved off at a high rate of speed and disappeared..
divs: sighting detailsi was home sunday afternoon and enjoying the blue sky on my back patio. after observing what i thought was a balloon travel from east to west, but changed direction and disappeared rapidly, i decided to film the sky for a little while. i set up a vivitar video camera on a tripod of the southern blue sky at an angle of about 90 degrees and left it for about 5 minutes. that was the only place i could safely position the camera due to a pet and trees in the way. i then loaded the video into my computer and watched at real time. i discovered about 20 white or dark objects at different times from different directions over the time of 5 minutes. there appears to be a lot of activity up there. i then began filming again facing north this time, but with a lot less activity. only three objects in about three minutes. i was running out of battery at this point. i took random pictures of objects when i lived in nc a few years ago, so this was not the first time. i sent those pictures to mufon in nc then. but, i have not had much time for research due to a busy work schedule. i have attached two videos. i also have documentation of the times of each object viewed in the videos. video 2 from 1:03-4:21 11 objects\ video 3 1:17-5:32 8 objects or more. you have to look closely to see them and then use slow motion to capture the speed. there are also birds and insects during the span of the videos and these are obvious. it's nice to know they are here too!
